Question & Options:
What roles do Diane and Camilla play in the context of their relationship in *Mulholland Drive*?
Options:
A. A) Diane hired a hitman to kill Camilla.
B. B) Diane and Camilla became friends after meeting on a film set.
C. C) Camilla invited Diane to a party at Adam's house.
D. D) Diane was the leading actress in The Sylvia North Story.
Correct Answer: A) Diane hired a hitman to kill Camilla., B) Diane and Camilla became friends after meeting on a film set., C) Camilla invited Diane to a party at Adam's house.

Correct Answer: A) Diane attends a party at Adam's house at Camilla's request., B) Diane hires a hitman to kill Camilla., C) Adam and Camilla are preparing to announce their marriage., D) Diane and Camilla were friends from their time on The Sylvia North Story.
